SpecCache Class Reference

Cache used with WaveClip to cache spectrum information (for drawing). Cache's the Spectrogram frequency samples. More...

Detailed Description

Cache used with WaveClip to cache spectrum information (for drawing). Cache's the Spectrogram frequency samples.
